name: Cran & Apple Cinnamon Cheese Ball
description: Savoury with a touch of sweet – ideal for after dinner or a casual glass with friends.
preparation: In a food processor or electric mixer, mix Dip Mix with cream cheese until smooth.
Form into a ball and roll in almonds.
Refrigerate for a few hours, or overnight. Remove from fridge 30 minutes before serving.
tips: Cookie crumbs can be used in place of sliced almonds.
For a great bagel spread, mix 2 tbsp of Dip Mix with 1 — 8 oz (250 g) container light spreadable cream cheese.
